name: CreateUpdatePriceOrFixedPrice

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

basePrice.description: SKU selling base price. If you decide to fill only the `basePrice` item, the `markup` and `costPrice` will be automatically generated to adapt to the number inserted in `basePrice`.
basePrice.title: basePrice

costPrice.description: SKU selling cost price. If you decide to fill the `costPrice` item, you must also fill the `markup` and `basePrice` will be automatically generated based on both values.
costPrice.title: costPrice

items.description: Array with general information about the SKU's fixed prices.

dateRange.description: Period of time when the fixed price will be applied to the SKU.
dateRange.title: dateRange

minQuantity.description: Minimum quantity of the SKU for the fixed price to be applied.
minQuantity.title: minQuantity

tradePolicyId.description: Trade policy name or ID that will have the fixed price configured.
tradePolicyId.title: tradePolicyId

items.title: fixedPrices

markup.description: The profit percentage that is to be obtained from the sale of that SKU. If you decide to fill the `markup` item, you must also fill the `costPrice`. The `basePrice` will be automatically generated based on both values.
markup.title: markup
